languages.text: {n}Ворон вдруг издает пронзительный клич и расправляет крылья. Из-под черных перьев на вас смотрят десятки блестящих, потусторонних глаз.{/n} "Власть над своей судьбой, Дитя Рассвета! Не более и не менее!"

{n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ворон вдруг издает пронзительный клич и расправляет крылья. Из-под черных перьев на вас смотрят десятки блестящих, потусторонних глаз.{/n} "Власть над своей судьбой, Дитя Рассвета! Не более и не менее!"

{n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"

languages.text: {n}Der Rabe kreischt plötzlich und breitet seine Flügel aus. Unter seinen schwarzen Federn sind Dutzende funkelnde, außerweltliche Augen, die dich anstarren.{/n} "Macht über das Schicksal, Kind der Dämmerung! Nicht mehr und nicht weniger!"
languages.original_text: {n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rabe kreischt plötzlich und breitet seine Flügel aus. Unter seinen schwarzen Federn sind Dutzende funkelnde, außerweltliche Augen, die dich anstarren.{/n} "Macht über das Schicksal, Kind der Dämmerung! Nicht mehr und nicht weniger!"

languages.text: {n}La corneille pousse soudain un croassement aigu et déploie ses ailes. Sous ses plumes noires, des dizaines d'étranges yeux brillants vous regardent fixement.{/n} « Le pouvoir de manipuler le destin, enfant de l'Aube ! Ni plus, ni moins ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La corneille pousse soudain un croassement aigu et déploie ses ailes. Sous ses plumes noires, des dizaines d'étranges yeux brillants vous regardent fixement.{/n} « Le pouvoir de manipuler le destin, enfant de l'Aube ! Ni plus, ni moins ! »

languages.text: {n}渡鸦突然尖叫起来，张开了双翼。黑色的羽毛之下，几十只仿佛来自另一个世界的眼睛正盯着你，闪闪发光。{/n}“用力量来驾驭命运吧，黎明之子！正是如此！”
languages.original_text: {n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"

traits.locale_text: {n}渡鸦突然尖叫起来，张开了双翼。黑色的羽毛之下，几十只仿佛来自另一个世界的眼睛正盯着你，闪闪发光。{/n}“用力量来驾驭命运吧，黎明之子！正是如此！”

languages.text: {n}De repente, el cuervo chilla y extiende las alas. Bajo sus plumas negras, una veintena de ojos brillantes y sobrenaturales te observa.{/n} «¡Poder sobre el destino, Vástago del Amanecer! ¡Ni más, ni menos!».
languages.original_text: {n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, el cuervo chilla y extiende las alas. Bajo sus plumas negras, una veintena de ojos brillantes y sobrenaturales te observa.{/n} «¡Poder sobre el destino, Vástago del Amanecer! ¡Ni más, ni menos!».

languages.text: {n}レイヴンは突然金切り声を上げ、翼を大きく広げた。真っ黒な羽根の下から、無数にきらめく異界の眼があなたを見つめている。{/n}「運命を操る力よ、暁の子よ！それ以上でも以下でもない！」
languages.original_text: {n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンは突然金切り声を上げ、翼を大きく広げた。真っ黒な羽根の下から、無数にきらめく異界の眼があなたを見つめている。{/n}「運命を操る力よ、暁の子よ！それ以上でも以下でもない！」

languages.text: {n}Kuzgun, ansızın çığlık atıyor ve kanatlarını sonuna dek geriyor. Kara tüylerinin altından onlarca pırıltılı, uhrevi göz sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kader üzerinde kudret Şafak Evladı! Ne eksik ne fazla!"
languages.original_text: {n}The raven suddenly shrieks and stretches its wings wide. From under its black feathers, dozens of glimmering, otherworldly eyes stare at you.{/n} "Power over destiny, Child of the Dawn! No more and no less!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgun, ansızın çığlık atar ve kanatlarını sonuna dek gerer. Kara tüylerinin altından onlarca pırıltılı, uhrevi göz sana bakar.{/n} "Kader üzerinde kudret Şafak Evladı! Ne eksik ne fazla!"
